description:
Roll on, roll off, and roll out. The EasyFold XT’s multiple points of contact hold your bike securely in place, giving you confidence on long drives and less than stellar gravel roads.

  • Integrated folding ramp lets you roll your bikes on and off
  • Supports bikes up to 29kg so e-bikes and fat bikes are no problem
  • Ergonomic carrying handle and wheels roll like luggage, great when taking the rack to and from the car
  • Space between bikes allows use with multiple bikes with Boost spacing and fat bikes
  • Detachable arms fit a wide variety of bikes
  • AcuTight torque limiting frame clamps, click when optimal tightness is reached, protecting your frame
  • Folding design tucks out of the way when not in use
  • Foot-pedal tilt for rear hatch access, even when loaded with bikes
  • Bikes lock to rack and the rack locks to vehicle, all with the same key
  • Reflectors add visibility
  • 22cm clearance between bikes
  • Max load is 65lb. per tray, 130lb. total
name: Thule EasyFold XT 2 Bike E-Bike and Fat Bike Hitch Rack
